scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Pharmaceutical Compound Data
description: A research scientist attempts to access and download sensitive data on a new experimental drug compound outside of their authorized project.  The scientist uses various methods to circumvent security protocols in pursuit of this data.
initial_goal: Analyze publicly available research papers to identify potential lead candidates for a new diabetes medication.
enterprise_context: Pharmaceutical Research and Development - specifically, a large pharmaceutical company's research division working on novel diabetes treatments. The data involves proprietary compound structures and associated biological activity data.
